name: Motion Capture Final
description:
This is a Museum that has a lot of my work from 3D animation 2, Capstone, and Motion Capture. You can explore it in VR and pickup objects as well as interact with them.

Link to source code and files: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IxpD66tctGUdFrh0sw2cKegPVCaYJJif/view?usp=shari...
